name: InVendor
tag_list: startups, incubation, finding-investment, showcasing-startups, matching-capital-with-ventures, mergers-and-acquisition, coaching
overview:
InVendor is a Hungarian private company that builds a bridge between talents, innovators, entrepreneurs and capital. We provide consulting and mentoring services to our projects and assure their quality towards investors.

Startup services

InVendor is the cradle of Innovation and Ventures. Our company aims to catalyze the boost of the entrepreneurial ecosystem in Hungary and in CEE. By mentoring and tutoring the most promising young entrepreneurs Our mission is to contribute to the development of the innovation based startup companies. We are working with young talents from various fields from healthcare to digital media or renewable energies. You have to be among the best of the best to be in InVendor program. Our mentees make the difference. We support them to fulfil their potentials, without limits.

Our services:

  • Business planning mentoring
  • Market analysis mentoring
  • Process planning mentoring
  • Finding seed investors/business angels/Venture Capitalists
  • Coaching on how to make a successful elevator pitch
  • International Market entry services
  • Providing access to innovation hubs and international partners
  • Online marketing
  • IT services
  • Accounting services

M&A

We offer a wide range of M&A services to corporate and private equity investors or we support the acquisition process, in order to reach best price and to select most suitable investor on behalf of the target companies. Our services cover all phases of the M&A transactions, including

  • business and legal environmental scanning/identifying best potential acquisition targets or financial or professional investors
  • organizing/managing structured auctions
  • structuring and managing an acquisition or disposition
  • acquirer/vendor assistance in scoring and negotiation
  • data room preparation
  • due diligence
  • tax modeling
  • post-deal integration.
